tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT,
  product_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  date_submitted TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  product_id UUID,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  product_id UUID,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  helpful_votes INT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ProductReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceFeedback (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id UUID,
  customer_id UUID,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Customer (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceFeedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  service_id UUID,
  customer_id UUID,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_tags_mapping (
    feedback_id INT,
    tag_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (feedback_id, tag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES customers_feedback(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES feedback_tags(tag_id)
);
